channel.title: JoJo's Bizzare Adventure - Golden Wind Smalltown - Signups (13/13)
channel.description:
![image|640x214, 100%](upload://tOiLMceI8eGv3Q3UZlcLzvWrCVG.jpeg) #
[color=gold] JoJo's Bizzare Adventure - Golden Wind Smalltown [/color]
Hosted by @Marluxion and Co-hosted by @Wazza and @katze ### [color=gold] Gameplay & Rules [/color] All Standard FM Rules apply. Find them [Here!](https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926) Days will last for 36 hours. Nights will last for 12 hours. Voting is plurality + majority. If majority is reached, the day will end early. Not yeeting is disabled. If the day ends with a tied vote, the yeet will be randomized among the tied. **Post Requirements: You must post at least once within 24 hours of SoD. You must post at least 10 times each day.** ### [color=gold]Smalltown & Special Mechanics[/color] This game is a **Smalltown** game. This means that every role is public knowledge. **Every role each player is assigned is **ALSO** public knowledge!** Alignment is randomized within the roles. This game is also **FLIPLESS**. Alignments will not be publicly revealed on death. Abilities cannot target yourself unless specifically stating that they can. ### [color=gold] Alignments[/color] There will be 10 villagers, 2 mafia and 1 lost wolf. The lost wolf does NOT know who the mafia are, but they do count for parity. The mafia do NOT know who the lost wolf is. Each night the mafia may choose to factional kill one player. This is performable alongside any role actions they might take. The lost wolf does **NOT** inherit the factional once both of the main mafia are dead. Each Alignment's win condition is listed below. > *You are a member of the town! Find and kill all 3 mafia to win!* > *You are a member of mafia! Your partner is [REDACTED]! Achieve parity with the town to win!* > *You are a mafia lost wolf! You do not know your fellow mafia! Achieve parity with the town to win!* ### [color=gold]Players:[/color] 1. Nutella 2. min 3. Chloe 4. an_gorta_pratai 5. BlueStorm 6. PokemonKidRyan 7. Ami 8. clonedcheese 9. DatBird 10. Zone_Q11 11. Esooa 12. EliThePsycho 13. Marshal #### [color=gold]Backups[/color] 1. Empoof 2. Whysper 3. WindwardAway #### [color=gold]Spectators[/color] 1. Arete (I) 2. TrustworthyLiberal 3. Astand (I) 4. Jane (U) 5. ATNoName (I) 6. thepigeonnyc (U) 7. Geyde (I) 8. 9. 10. * This setup is strongly inspired by Starship Epiphron and flavored around JoJo's Bizzare Adventure. Shoutout to both of those things!

item.title: JoJo's Bizzare Adventure - Golden Wind Smalltown - Signups (13/13)
item.dc:creator: katze
item.description:
A small change to the Bus Driver role has been made.

Marluxion:

Risotto Nero
Bus Driver

Each night you can target two players. Any actions targeting one player will instead target the other and vice versa. You may not target the same player twice in a row.

(The bolded was added)

Read full topic

item.title: JoJo's Bizzare Adventure - Golden Wind Smalltown - Signups (13/13)
item.dc:creator: Marshal
item.description:
Neutral class: bill gates

goal: reduce the population to 3 or less people (including yourself) by the end of the game

passive: billions of dollars: as long as you havent run out of uses of any of your abilities, you will be death immune

day ability: vaccinate: target player will be healed at night for the next 2 nights. on the third they will die (3 uses)

day ability: microchip: target player will be microchipped, telling you who they visit for the rest of the game (inf uses)

night ability: kill switch: kill target player with a microchip (2 uses)

night ability: reduce emissions: reduce emissions by throwing target into a pit with no food at the bottom. they wont be able to make accusations of treason the following day (4 uses)

Read full topic
item.source: JoJo's Bizzare Adventure - Golden Wind Smalltown - Signups (13/13)

item.title: JoJo's Bizzare Adventure - Golden Wind Smalltown - Signups (13/13)
item.dc:creator: Chloe
item.description:
Marluxion:

Each night the mafia may choose to factional kill one player. This is performable alongside any role actions they might take. The lost wolf does NOT inherit the factional once both of the main mafia are dead.

is the factional kill assigned? (mostly asking bc of the past tracker)

Marluxion:

Alignment Reciever
Whenever a player dies, you will recieve a phone call from The Boss privately telling you what alignment that player was.

if the LW dies, is it specified, or are they just told ‘mafia’

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: clonedcheese
item.description:
eli just randomly liked this

[COMBINED THREAD] Homestuck FM - New Session - Town and PM wins! Completed
Bodies are found. The crew…grieved? @ash4fun has died. They were… Rose Lalonde [02717_1] Consider this your first lesson in showmanship. Town Lover Lynchcop God Tier (Passive): Achieving god tier status provides you with godlike power. The first time you die in a strife, revive instantly. Your role will not be revealed during that time. Lilith in Starlight (Passive): You are passionately in love with another player. As such, you know that fourfourfourfour has the same alignment as you. …

@EliThePsycho i need an explanation

Read full topic
